Chris Meyns

Reason and randomness

Twitter Academia.edu RSS

June 23, 2014

Descartes talk at APA Pacific 2014

At the upcoming 2014 APA Pacific Division Meeting, I’ll be giving the paper ‘Descartes Against Estimation’, on Descartes’s transformation of a prominent account of primitive evaluative cognition.

June 23, 2014

Metaphysics of powers at Joint Session

I’ll be presenting ‘The Distinction of Powers’, my paper against a manifestation type based distinction of powers, at the 2014 Aristotelian Society and Mind Association Joint Session.

June 23, 2014

Speaking at Princeton-Penn-Columbia GC in History of Philosophy

I will be speaking at the Princeton-Penn-Columbia Graduate Conference in the History of Philosophy, to be held on April 26 in Princeton this year.

June 23, 2014

Review of Oxford Handbook for Medieval Philosophy

On May 16 the Edinburgh Women in Philosophy Group hosts its annual Spring Workshop. I will give a response to Amia Srinivasan.
